The original photograph was taken circa 1972 and featured John Lennon playing guitar with Wayne "Tex" Gabriel, not Che Guevara. This alteration was likely done to create a sensational or intriguing image, but it does not reflect a real historical event. This category is defined as content that has been intentionally altered through manual photo editing or other forms of manipulation to create a misleading impression.

This suggests that the image has likely been manipulated or taken out of context to create a scenario that did not occur.
